comment.author: 23835356@N00
comment._content: neat idea. tho you guys should have done a live paint session with contemporary street artists... would have brought everything right up to the present.... and it would have created a record of stuff that's going on now...

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: That is a great idea too!  We will make sure to pass this on to the staff working on this project, as it's something to keep in mind for future exhibitions.  Thanks for the comment!
